duties_responsibilities.duty: Create structural steel and sheet metal design and layout of fabrication details using 3D modeling software.
Verify accuracy of models and create detailed shop drawings from 3D models.
Generate DXF files for laser-cut parts and STP files for beam processor parts.
Review projects, determine material quantities required, and assist Sales Department with estimates.

education_certification.credential: Graduation from High School or GED equivalent. Graduation from an accredited Technical School Program or an Associates of Technology Degree in CAD Technology preferred.
